MinionAllDifferent  
MinionBoolVariable Notes on indices: Single boolean variables have the same relative index as absolute index (since boolean variables are the first ones on Minion models).

MinionElementConstraint  
MinionEqConstraint Equality Constraint
MinionIdentifier Each variable has a relative index (index concerning the domain type of the variables only) and an absolute index (index concerning all variables) and can only be identified by that.
